solution_code:
def max_product(nums):
    n = len(nums) 
    max_till_now = nums[0] 
    min_till_now = nums[0] 
    res = nums[0] 
  
    for i in range(1, n): 
          
        if nums[i] < 0: 
            max_till_now, min_till_now = min_till_now, max_till_now 
              
        max_till_now = max(nums[i], max_till_now * nums[i]) 
        min_till_now = min(nums[i], min_till_now * nums[i]) 
        
        res = max(res, max_till_now) 
  
    return res
